attributes.action: Close our borders, protect our heritage, protect our children
attributes.additional_details: People of the uk don’t feel safe. The NHS cannot deal with more and more people we are a little country that is hugely over populated, do something before it’s to late.
attributes.background: Close our borders make the country safe again, people are coming to abuse the system the things we are seeing daily is scary not only for our futures but right now.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Close the borders! Suspend ALL immigration for 5 years.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652866
